song.title: Blinded of You (Feat. Lisa's Antenna)
song.info:
Lyrics (incomplete): [???] Here is a light Maybe I could [???] I could be [???] all [???] to you and me all the sounds [???] The sun on your shoulder
I know [???] inside of your love By those words [???] Blessed by those words Be by my side Blinded of you
[???] of your love I've had to take this time [This is why] I don't sleep at night I'm in love for you and me Share those words I have to say You have to say
I need to rest [???] only be for you I just have to take this time being in love and all the sounds of it
I need to rest... I'm with you
[???] [???] The [sun] [???] Your love [???] Cry
[???] of your love I've had to take this time [???] I don't sleep at night I'm in love for you and me Share those words you have to say
I just have to take this time only for me to ignore this Monday morning It's going to end [rising up] to better days
I need to rest... I'm with you
[???] [???] The sun on your shoulder [???] [???] by your love
I know [???] inside of your love By those words, just words Blessed by those words Be by my side Blinded of you
[???] of your love I've had to take this time [This is why] I don't sleep at night I'm in love for you and me Share those words you have to say
